message: Hi Bob, thanks for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable item at a competitive price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $90. Can you consider $95?
I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to compromise a bit more and offer it to you for $110.
I'm starting to get close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above $90. Can you consider $98?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $115.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $90. Can you consider $100?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $105, but no lower. This is my final offer.
